error_fixes.fixed_line: background-image: url('https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6WqNjZbtxYs/WO551PgzOKI/AAAAAAACjrA/Fc9zltnYmGQOKWJnaRKsxWWVd45WmoZWACLcB/s1600/Novo-Hyundai-Sonata-2018%2B%25287%2529.jpg') alt='Background image'; /* Replace with your background image URL */

success_criteria: select element missing an associated label
error_example:
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>
fixed_example:
<label for="filter">Filter</label>
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>

<label for="name">Name:</label>
<select id="services_select" name="services" aria-label="Select a service">
